content:
Prodam omenjeni prenosnik z najboljšimi specifikacijami.

http://www.laptopmag.com/reviews/laptops/lenovo-yoga-900

Cena 1320€

Več na ZS.

Lenovo Yoga 900 13.3" Ultrabook
(champagne gold )
Core i7 6500U / 2.5 GHz - Win 10 Home 64-bit - 16 GB RAM -
512 GB SSD - 13.3"
IPS touchscreen 3200 x 1800 ( QHD+ )
intel HD Graphics 520,
author: bazo
